title: MECHANICAL OR PRESSURE CLEANING OF CARPETS, RUGS, SACKS, HIDES, OR OTHER SKIN OR TEXTILE ARTICLES OR FABRICS; TURNING INSIDE-OUT FLEXIBLE TUBULAR OR OTHER HOLLOW ARTICLES
informative_references: Mechanical preparation or mechanical treatment of bed feathers
definition_statement: This place covers: Methods or devices for mechanical or pressure cleaning of textile articles or fabrics. Methods or devices for turning inside-out tubular or other hollow textile articles.

title: Beating, brushing, or otherwise mechanically cleaning or pressure cleaning carpets, rugs, sacks, hides, or other skin or textile articles or fabrics

Turning inside-out flexible tubular or other hollow articles  (in combination with inspecting D06H3/16  {; turning tubes inside out in the shaping joining of plastics or shaping of substances in a plastic state B29C67/0018})
glossary_of_terms: Flexible tubular or other hollow articlestextile or fabric type articles

title: Mechanical, vacuum, or pressure cleaning in combination with the turning inside-out of flexible tubular or other hollow articles
glossary_of_terms: Flexible tubular or other hollow articlestextile or fabric type articles
